title: ClickTight Convertibles: Removing the Cover
description: How to remove the cover from the Britax Marathon ClickTight, Boulevard ClickTight, and Advocate ClickTight convertible car seats. **Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.

asset.author: Britax Child Safety, Inc
asset.hookText:
How to remove the cover from the Britax Marathon ClickTight, Boulevard ClickTight, and Advocate ClickTight convertible car seats. **Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.
For more information about Britax ClickTight convertible car seats, visit http://www.britaxusa.com/clicktight-convertibles
